alert.note: Alert for Gentry; Harrison; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 4:16PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Worth, Gentry and northwestern Harrison Counties through 445 PM CST... At 416 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Albany, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Eagleville, New Hampton, Darlington, Gentry, Allendale, Denver, Martinsville and Hatfield. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 105 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for north central and northwestern Missouri.
